Title: MyMediaStuff - Catel demo app
Description:
MyMediaStuff is a demo application that shows some advanced features of Catel, an open-source MVVM Framework for WPF and Silverlight.

For more information about Catel, visit http://catel.codeplex.com.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
MyMediaStuff is a demo application that shows some advanced features of Catel, an open-source MVVM Framework for WPF and Silverlight.

For more information about Catel, visit http://catel.codeplex.com.

Below is a video demonstrating the application:

Launch in another window


Although the application looks really simply (that's the purpose), there are some pretty advanced features that answer the following question:
  1. How to create view-models for user controls, based on the datacontext?
  2. How to play a video without directly calling an element on the view from the view-model?
  3. How to use services in the view-models to show pop-up windows?

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to start a discussion! We are here to help!
